meanings.definition: A type of hat with a narrow brim and indented crown.
meanings.sent1: She wore one of her favorite trilbies to the outdoor concert.
meanings.sent2: The store had a display of various trilbies in different colors.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone decided to wear trilbies for fun.
meanings.sent4: The trilbies on the rack whispered stories of past adventures.
meanings.sent5: The detective always wore his lucky trilby when solving mysteries.

meanings.definition: Plural form of trilby, referring to multiple hats of this style.
meanings.sent1: The actors in the play all wore matching trilbies for the final scene.
meanings.sent2: In the vintage shop, you could find trilbies from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The trilbies lined up on the shelf looked like a colorful army.
meanings.sent4: As the wind blew, the trilbies danced on the hat stand.
meanings.sent5: She collected trilbies from around the world, each with its own story.
